title: Lady Lyte's Little Secret
description: Felicity Lyte was in a quandry. How could she tell her cherished paramour of his impending fatherhood? Hawthorn Greenwood, despite his straitened circumstances, would surely make a responsible, honorable offer of marriage -- which Felicity could never accept. For she would only wed him in truebound love -- or not at all!Thorn Greenwood had thought to share an idyllic Season with Lady Lyte -- and instead found his soul's partner. But Felicity had abruptly ended their liaison. Did she think him a fortune hunter? A rank falsehood, that, for the only wealth he sought was the bounty of her love!
author: Deborah Hale
